title: A unique wheel-shaped exposed core LSPR-PCF sensor for dual-peak sensing: Applications in the optical communication bands, M-IR region and biosensing
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Mohammad Rakibul Islam, Ali Ahnaf Hassan, Shihab Shahriar, Sumaiya Tasnim Adiba, Fahima Shahana Rahman, Safin Zaman, Muhammad Alif Al Hosain
